title: The Shadows and Other Stories
description: Leigh Brackett (1915 – 1978) was an immensely talented writer of science fiction, and is known as the “Queen of Space Opera.” She also was a very talented screenwriter having written the script for The Big Sleep in 1945 and the first draft of The Empire Strikes Back.The Shadows (1952) – Friend or foe, they dogged intruding footsteps…Quest of the Starhope (1949) – They were helpless, these human-like captives from other planets, and Quintal, the ruthless hunter, was strong…RUNAWAY (1954) – It took a trip to Venus to prove to Reid that the one thing he couldn’t escape was himself.Complete with all of the original illustrations.
author: Leigh Brackett
